snippet: The investigation is focused on the storage of aluminum by Goldman Sachs and other companies, which beverage makers say are distorting the market.
abstract: Commodity Futures Trading Commission issues subpoenas to Goldman Sachs and owners of other major warehouses as part of its inquiry into irregularities in aluminum market that are believed to have cost consumers billions of dollars since 2010.
lead_paragraph: The investigation is focused on the storage of aluminum by Goldman Sachs and other companies, which beverage makers say are distorting the market.

headline.main: U.S. Subpoenas Goldman in Inquiry of Aluminum Warehouses
headline.print_headline: U.S. Subpoenas Goldman in Inquiry of Aluminum Warehouses
